item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - More Gains Sighted - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - More Gains Sighted - NEWSBTC

item.title: 'Dash Across America Tour' Hits Bitcoin Roadblock In Las Vegas
item.description:
'Dash Across America Tour' Hits Bitcoin Roadblock In Las Vegas

The Blush family's "Dash Across America Tour" in its Bitcoin Bus was denied assistance from a Las Vegas bitcoin organizer in setting up a meetup in Las Vegas because of the tour's support for Dash.

item.title: The Crypto Show with James Prestwich COO of Storj.io, Lyn Ulbricht and Robert Lindsay Nathan
item.description:
The Crypto Show with James Prestwich COO of Storj.io, Lyn Ulbricht and Robert Lindsay Nathan

The first hour we talk with James Prestwich of Storj.io on the current state of Storj and how it works. Then Lyn Ulbricht calls in to fill us in the latest with Ross's case. Finally we talk with Robert Lindsay Nathan a musician who has graciously donated his music to the FreeRoss.org fundraiser.

item.title: Why can't we fight Bitcoin thieves by not accepting payments from hacked accounts?
item.description:
Why can't we fight Bitcoin thieves by not accepting payments from hacked accounts?

It really isn't possible to create a blacklist of stolen bitcoins. While it is possible to easily trace stolen bitcoins, thieves can utilize a number of services, such as bitcoin mixing services, that mix stolen bitcoins with other (sometimes even freshly mined) bitcoins before redistributing the bitcoins to new wallet addresses.

item.title: California Lawmaker Pulls Digital Currency Bill After EFF Opposition
item.description:
California Lawmaker Pulls Digital Currency Bill After EFF Opposition

For the second year in a row, EFF and a coalition of virtual currency and consumer protection organizations have beaten back a California bill that would have created untenable burdens for the emerging cryptocurrency community. This week, the author of A.B.

item.title: Can you make a blockchain where every node is a miner?
item.description:
Can you make a blockchain where every node is a miner?

I want to build an application on its own blockchain. I'd like it to be such that each node, in the form of an app, is also a miner, so that all users are taking part in processing and confirming transactions. Also, how can you make it so that the apps don't become large in data size?

item.title: Is bitcoin the answer if traditional investments are letting you down?
item.description:
Is bitcoin the answer if traditional investments are letting you down?

Looking at the negligible returns offered on cash investments, Edward Cunningham started searching for alternatives. Instead of going to the stock market or buying up gold bars, however, the 45-year-old from Sherborne in Dorset turned to the internet, and last September invested in the digital currency bitcoin.

item.title: Ethplorer Lets Everyone Publicly Track Ethereum-based Tokens
item.description:
Ethplorer Lets Everyone Publicly Track Ethereum-based Tokens

Having a new explorer to check things on a particular blockchain is always a welcome change. Ethplorer was recently released to the public, and it allows users to locate custom asset tokens created on the Ethereum blockchain. This means users can track tokens such as DAO, DGX, and others through this platform.

item.description:

Ethereum classic price is under a bearish pressure versus BTC, and it may continue to head lower in the near term. item.title: The Exodus Desktop Wallet Tracks Multiple Blockchain Assets
item.description:
The Exodus Desktop Wallet Tracks Multiple Blockchain Assets

Cryptocurrency wallets come in many different sizes. Some of them only exist as software, whereas hardware solutions are becoming more popular. But most of these wallets only track one, or a select few cryptocurrencies. The Exodus wallet tracks multiple assets and has ShapeShift functionality built in.
